7898.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn, 
causes colossal damage to enemy 
and lowers ATK & DEF

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

7899.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn, 
causes mega-colossal damage and 
greatly lowers ATK & DEF with 
a high chance of stunning the enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Shadow Dragons' Awakening
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Ki +7 and all enemies' 
ATK & DEF -30% for 1 turn
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated starting from the 7th turn 
from the start of battle (once only)

Button.Name: Is the turn count 7 or more?

Slider.Name: What turn is it?
